headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Suffers a Larger Drop Than the General Market: Key Insights
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Devon Energy (DVN) stood at $33.76, denoting a -1.34% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: ConocoPhillips: LNG Strategy Set To Benefit From U.S/EU Trade Deal
summary: ConocoPhillips is expanding its LNG business. Its stake in the Port Arthur LNG project position it well to benefit from the recent U.S./EU trade deal.
